New Records: Kusal Mendis scored 60 runs off 37 balls in his T20I debut
Shakib Al Hasan became the second cricketer to reach 6,000 T20 runs
Key Match Events: Asitha Fernando and Maheesh Theekshana ran two off the third ball of the last over to trigger a no-ball siren
Kusal Mendis survived four lives during his innings
The match was sealed with Asitha Fernando hitting a two and a six in the last over
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh sent out Sabbir Rahman and Mehidy Hasan Miraz after exhausting six different opening pairs this year
Mehidy Hasan Miraz scored at a 140-plus strike rate in his innings
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka players celebrated wildly in the dressing room after their victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Asitha Fernando made his T20I debut in this match
Taskin Ahmed took two catches and two wickets in the match
Others: This was the 5th Match in Group B of the Men's T20 Asia Cup
